English.alert.import:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter “Tun Continuously” mode in Cronios. otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

You may also want to adjust the cron schedule expression for the job to better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minutes.
English.alert.lastSent: Your last text message was sent on:
English.alert.lastSent.never: You have never sent a text message using Text When I Arrive.
English.alert.location.none: No location specified. Please launch this shortcut from the Shortcuts Home to configure before running it in Cronios.
English.alert.recipient.nome: No recipient specified. Please launch this shortcut from the Shortcuts Home to configure before running it in Cronios.
English.alert.success.message: Your text message to “{{recipient}}” was sent.
English.error.cronios: Cronios is not installed on this iOS device. Download it from http://cronios.com.
English.error.cronios.title: Cronios Not Installed
English.prompt.action: Choose an action to run when you are in the location’s trigger radius.
English.prompt.frequency: How often do you want this cron job to run in Cronios? Check times start from the top of the hour.
English.prompt.iPad: This iPad may only be able to send messages to iMessage recipients, not SMS messages.
English.prompt.location: Enter the location where you want the text message to be sent.
English.prompt.message: Enter the message you want to send to the recipient when arriving at the location.
English.prompt.openApp: Text When I Arrive must switch to the Shortcuts app in order to check the current location and send the message.
English.prompt.recipient: Enter a single recipient to send the text message to.
English.prompt.repeat: How often should the action be run if you are within the location’s trigger radius?
English.prompt.shortcut: Choose a shortcut to run when you are within the location’s trigger radius.
English.prompt.triggerRadius: Enter the radius around the location where you want the location trigger to occur.
English.prompt.unlock: You will need to unlock this device to get the current location and send a message.
